attributes.action: More help for mums with postnatal depression
attributes.additional_details: Families affected by post natal depression need more support!! Children should NOT be removed from the care of their mothers by Social Services, they should offer support to keep a family together. Mental health support needs to be more sympathetic so that suffering mums feel comfortable to speak out instead of being afraid of being labeled!

rejection.details: Please see: Support and education for families dealing with postnatal depression
